channel.title: Posts on SOTTOVUOTO
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on SOTTOVUOTO

item.title: 7 Steps
item.description:
Congratulations! You came so far. You overpassed all the difficult trials, you fought against evil forces and you followed your master down the dungeon into this secret place of spiritual healing.

Nah, I’m just kidding! It’s just my personal blog. It just started as an experiment and now I don’t know exactly what to write about except for random stuff like these. But you did take a long journey to come here, so that’s why I feel it’s my duty to reward your resilience by offering you my 7 steps of self-trascendence:

  1. Hvob - Oxid

  2. Bonobo - Defender

  3. Kirinji - Killer tune kills me

  4. Mariana Froes - Rosa e Laranja

  5. Anna Hisbbur - Before Bed

  6. Mariya Takeuchi - Plastic Love

  7. Zin - Walk-in Closet

After you’ll complete the 7 steps, you will reach spiritual illumination. If not, come back again and we’ll reimburse you. This is not a scam, money back guaranteee. Call now!

item.title: Hugo
item.description:
So this website is also my first experiment with Hugo + Github pages. And one of my very few experiments with developing overall.

I know. Lame. But what else would you expect from someon that has never touched the code, if not for a couple of lessons at school? This website is only a place where I can park some thoughts and I wanted something simple and minimalistic, easy to deploy. I’ve read some suggestions online and I landed into this solution that involves Hugo as a static website generator and Github Pages as a hosting place. Ah, forgot to mention, I also wanted something to be free, so I don’t incur in the problem to have billings out of control. This solution satisfied me, in the end. The only flip-side is that, with this method, you have to generate a new website each time you deploy a new edit or post. This is not the most efficient way to update the website, but maybe I’m just unfamiliar with it.

item.title: First day
item.description:
So here we are. It’s been a while, uh? This is my first attempt to create an independent little website where I will talk about everything and whatever, so stick around. Mostly I will talk about art, design, food, popular culture and the occasional rant. I come from Mastodon, so you had probably met me already there. If not, I’m CONTESTO, go follow me! @contesto@mastodon.uno

Beside that, a little about me:

  • My name is Lorenzo
  • I am 29 y.o.
  • I was born in Trento [IT]
  • I studied graphic design & communication
  • I just started a little community about Japan on Feddit here: https://feddit.it/c/giappone
  • If you like Weval, we can be good friends
